ygData.subject: Re: Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: yeah they had almost the same thing in Diablo. certain strength is required for this, hence a lower level warrior couldn t use the item until he upgraded
ygData.messageBody:
yeah they had almost the same thing in Diablo. certain strength is required
for this, hence a lower level warrior couldn't use the item until he
upgraded (leveled) enough to get it
-----Original Message-----
From: Jay Hollums <jhollums@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, May 24, 1999 10:25 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


>From: "Jay Hollums" <jhollums@...>
>
>Okay I have to comment, I have been Idle too long....
>
>If they had put in the mud's little trick of level based equip then there
>would never be any twinking...
>
>IE you cant put on that +25 mana ring till your 20th level....
>
>simple and perfect... problem solved...
>
>ps this has been in muds for DECADES (no I'm not exagerating this)
>
>
>Rutree
>
